SEARCH
Package Medicine

Class Medicine

java.lang.Object
Medicine.Medicine
Direct Known Subclasses:
MedicineUI, Prescription
public class Medicine extends Object
The Medicine class represents a medicine with basic properties such as its name, stock level, and low stock alert level. It includes methods for getting and setting these properties, as well as a method to convert the medicine information to a CSV format.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected int
    initialStock
    The initial stock level of the medicine

    lowStockLevelAlert
    The stock level at which a low stock alert is triggered

    medicineName
    The name of the medicine
